r2dii.data 0.0.0.9000

  • r2dii

r2dii.data

The goal of r2dii.data is to host and document r2dii datasets, including generic datasets, and fake datasets for examples and tests.

Installation

Install the development version of r2dii.data with something like this:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/r2dii.dataraw")

How to minimize installation errors?

Example

Go to examples.
